about_the_game:
# MELIGO Creator v1.0 What has changed

● Improve the quality of motion capture
- Head mode: Improving the bending or turning of the body or neck during use
- Half-body mode: Improvement of clapping areas
- Full body mode: Improve heel lift or some unnatural behavior
- Mollisen Animation Quality Improvement
- The calibration stage was divided into three, and more natural finger movements were implemented.

● Improvement of calibration
- I changed it to tracker automatic recognition except for the complicated tracker allocation.
- However, it must be worn in the correct position to track the worn area.
- Save calibration data
- The data is saved by one calibration of the head/half/body mode.
- If you have stored data, you can easily change the mode.
- Even if you re-run the program, you can use the previous data right away.
- However, if the room setting of the SteamVR is wrong or there is a change in the equipment, please recalibrate it.

● UI/UX improvement
- Improved uncomfortable and complex UI and UX.
- It is saved immediately so that the stored data is not lost.

● ● Spout2Capture 지원
- Available on OBS and Africa Freakshot.

● Update Convenience Features
- Added 2D image prefab functionality
- Add character position, size, and angle adjustment
- Add a background shortcut (key hooking)
- Adding volume control
- Add resolution control
- Add automatic login
- Added full body mode lower body lock
detailed_description:
# MELIGO Creator v1.0 What has changed

● Improve the quality of motion capture
- Head mode: Improving the bending or turning of the body or neck during use
- Half-body mode: Improvement of clapping areas
- Full body mode: Improve heel lift or some unnatural behavior
- Mollisen Animation Quality Improvement
- The calibration stage was divided into three, and more natural finger movements were implemented.

● Improvement of calibration
- I changed it to tracker automatic recognition except for the complicated tracker allocation.
- However, it must be worn in the correct position to track the worn area.
- Save calibration data
- The data is saved by one calibration of the head/half/body mode.
- If you have stored data, you can easily change the mode.
- Even if you re-run the program, you can use the previous data right away.
- However, if the room setting of the SteamVR is wrong or there is a change in the equipment, please recalibrate it.

● UI/UX improvement
- Improved uncomfortable and complex UI and UX.
- It is saved immediately so that the stored data is not lost.

● ● Spout2Capture 지원
- Available on OBS and Africa Freakshot.

● Update Convenience Features
- Added 2D image prefab functionality
- Add character position, size, and angle adjustment
- Add a background shortcut (key hooking)
- Adding volume control
- Add resolution control
- Add automatic login
- Added full body mode lower body lock
